name: Windows 11 in React
description: Windows 11 in React. Currently users can interact and open the browser, vscode and pdf viewer. It's possible to drag windows. Also news widget on bottom-left, date and start menu(windows icon) is interactable. News are cached on my backend and updated every 6 hours to not exceed request limit of news API. Still in development.

name: Weather App
description: This weather app displays current weather(current temperature, condition, humidity and wind speed) in a desired city. It is possible to get 3-day hourly forecast by switching to "Forecast" tab. Hourly forecast is horizontally scrolable.

name: LOTR
description: This app displays LOTR books, movies, characters and quotes in tabular form. You will see a random quote on start and it is possible to ask for a new one.
